description: Jan Hein Hoogstad, known by the alias Yeehaa, is a professional who explores interdisciplinary approaches to design and tech. He authored the blog post 'Align the Misaligned' and curated a course with the same title, focusing on aligning personal and professional goals through a strategic and holistic approach.
blurb: Jan Hein Hoogstad, also known as Yeehaa, leverages interdisciplinary knowledge to innovate in tech and design. Explore his insights on aligning goals and building conceptual ecosystems.
